title: The Minemaker
creator_credit: Rod Kinnear, Conzinc Riotinto Australia and Rod Kinnear Productions
brief_description: This film describes the varied activities of CRA and its associates and subsidiary companies, including exploration, mining at Broken Hill, the Hammersley Iron project, financing and computer work, Comalco’s aluminium industry, Blair Athol coal, and copper mining on Bougainville.
creator_credit_for_label: Rod Kinnear, Conzinc Riotinto Australia and Rod Kinnear Productions
